alert.note: Alert for Mason; Putnam (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 10:57PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with heavy rain will impact portions of southern Gallia, southwestern Mason and Putnam Counties through MIDNIGHT EDT... At 1055 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Buffalo, or 12 miles west of Winfield, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Nitro, Winfield, Eleanor, Buffalo, Poca, Teays Valley, Bancroft, Gallopolis Ferry, Fraziers Bottom and Ashton. This includes Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 36 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Turn around, don`t drown!
